text.data: Teline...[end]
Teline... Today... My promise to you... was fulfilled.[end]

Teline...
[0x24]Ifs[0x22] are not allowed for warriors, But just this once, I do not want to be a warrior! Teline...[end]

My son... At a good age, without work, pretending he's with this Resistance...
And our savings in the jars are about to run out too...[end]
[0x2a]woof[0x2a] [0x2a]whimper[0x2a] [0x28]Master... our family is having a crisis...[0x29][end]
Grandma... Tomorrow I will be going to the harem... You seem happy for some reason...[end]
Eww, stay away from me, you old man!![end]

When the Imperial Army returned, the King's harem was revived!
Mommy... went to the harem. She took a Drawer Thing with her. She said it was for good luck![end]

Pretending to be King Kahna is really popular among Dafila's royal family!!
Even though it's hot with a fake mustache and a king's cloak they put up with it!![end]
I can't say it to the kids... Honey... come home...[end]
Libero: Oh... I'm worried...[end]
Start a discussion It's none of my business.[end1]

Oh... There's a map of the temple of the Holy Dragon in the royal palace...
You could get it while helping out with the revolution, but...[end]

There have been no victories for the Freedom Revolutionaries ever since the Imperial Army showed up. However... Even though we chose the name [0x24]Freedom Revolutionaries[0x22], we don't have a leader... I'm at best Number 2... How about it... You're the leader of the Resistance, aren't you? Won't you be our leader too?[end]
Sure thing, leave it to me!! It doesn't concern me.[end1]
Okay! Seems you want to help after all! You don't seem like a popular kind of guy. But, that's okay! Being in the revolution is cool, don't you think? No girl will ever leave you alone![end]
When you've decided you want popularity and freedom, come back and see me! It will begin tonight! Tonight we shall be reborn![end]
Libero: Are you ready?[end]
Wander around town Wait for nightfall[end1]
That night...[end]
Sajin: Oh, nobody will ever find me... Patience, patience... This is part of my training too. Oh!!!![end]
Hey buddy! I've been spotted![end]

Zeroshin: Excellent work, leader of the Resistance!
By the way, won't you hire us? We'll accept payment afterwards...
That's right... We'll accept up to 15 installments.[end]

Sajin: We are special assassins who perform with no mistakes!!
Right now, for a basic fee, we will give you Level 2 ninjutsu for free.
For the optional package, we'll need a down payment.[end]
Will you hire us?[end]
Basic fee [0x28]pay later[0x29] Optional [0x28]3000 Piro down payment[0x29][end1]
Why, I ought to kill you!![end]
For the optional package, please select from the following menu.[end]
Assassination of Matelite Assassination of Princess [character][0x1] Assassination of crew member[end1]
Thank you. We are glad to do business with you.[end]
Sajin: I'll use this to work hard on my training... Where will I hide this time...[end]
Zeroshin: Mom, sorry for worrying you. After this job ends... It looks like I'll be out of work again...[end]
Zeroshin: Mom... I found a job. It doesn't pay much but I think I can do it...[end]
A revolution needs the uniform support of the people...[end]
I'm not popular... I'm not popular... Why?! Guys, why aren't I popular?[end]
I don't really know. But I wanna participate in the revolution! Don't you?[end]

Without a revolution for freedom, Dafila has no future!
Without women, we have no future![end]
We've brought in special assassins-for-hire for the revolution tonight, so don't worry. Huh?! Now where did those two go?[end]
You got a box of Drawer Things. There were 11 inside.[end]
You got 5 High Drugs.[end]
You got 5 Super Vodkas.[end]
You got a Difficult Book, a Strategy Book, a Genius Notebook, and an XXX Porno Mag.[end]
You got a Calamitias.[end]
There is 3000 Piro in the jar. Will you steal it?[end]
Yes No[end1]
This family will probably leave town suddenly during the night...[end]
This family will probably go drown itselt...[end][end]
